Implementation of inter-Korean declaration called for
articles.content:
Implementation of inter-Korean declaration called for 
    Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- The United Confederations of Koreans in Russia and Ukraine released a joint statement on Jan. 20 in support of the appeal to the 70 million fellow countrymen made at the 2001 meeting for the independent reunification of the Korean nation.
 The statement stressed the need for the entire nation to implement in a responsible manner the June 15 north-south joint declaration which brought about a radical phase of national reunification.    
 Any forces which hesitate to implement the joint declaration, in violation of the principle clarified in it and reading other's face and do things harmful to its implementation, will face a stern judgement of history, it warned. 
 It declared that the confederations would vigorously join in the reunification movement for this year and the nationwide movement for the country's reunification during the "June 15-August 15 period of the campaign for promoting national reunification".

articles.title: Democratic reforms urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Democratic reforms urged in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- The "National Council of Pastors for Justice and Peace" in South Korea called a press conference in Seoul on January 18 in demand of democratic reforms and published a declaration on situation in the name of 2,000 members, Yonhap News reported.
 The declaration urged the authorities to immediately abrogate the "Security Law" and institute laws on human rights and prevention of corruption.    
 It also demanded that the authorities administer politics for people, push ahead with reforms and accept people's opinions.

New Year stamp
articles.content:
New Year stamp 
    Pyongyang, January 24 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications have issued a stamp in celebration of the New Year.
 Against a background of the fluttering red flag are drawn heavy industrial establishments and modern military hardware. pictured on the lower part are a pine tree symbolic of the Koreans' stamina and the characters "Juche 90 (2001)", and on the right "Happy New Year ".    
 The stamp represents the spirit and will of the Korean people who are advancing towards the final victory of the Korean revolution under the red flag of socialism.
